data.name: Gunjump Before Dinner
data.detailed_description:
Gunjumping game for gunjumping people.

Evil Professor Y has kidnapped your father (yet again) and is forcing him to do evil things for Evil Things Co. It's up to you to rescue your lame dad. Preferably before dinner gets stale.

You play as Lily, badass teenager armed with massive revolver with insane knockback. Use the gun as your main movement tool and clear your way through challenging obstacle course with a clip size of six bullets. The controls are simple and intuitive. Aim and gunjump with either mouse or gamepad.



  • Tight and responsive controls
  • Countless ways to die
  • Quick respawn: you are immediately back at it
  • Total of 100+ levels in 4 unique zones
  • Zero water levels

Gunjump Before Dinner focuses on two aspects that are in common among our favourite precision platformers: fun movement and solid level design.

data.short_description: 2D precision platformer with tight and responsive controls. Gunjump your way through challenging obstacle course. Rescue your lame dad who's been kidnapped and get home for dinner.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-7100 equivalent or more
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 equivalent or more
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: With these specs you would have no trouble. More accurate minimum requirements will be available in the future.
